actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the use of post and base exchanges and commissary stores by persons who, but for age, would be entitled to retired pay under chapter 67 of such title.

summary.text: Entitles certain nonregular members of the armed forces who have met all the requirements for a military pension, but have not attained 60 years of age, to post-exchange and commissary privileges.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the use of post and base exchanges and commissary stores by persons who, but for age, would be entitled to retired pay under chapter 67 of such title.
